home.meta.title: nomuman
home.heroLead: Product engineer in Japan. I build lightweight tools with a soft spot for geometry, animals, and books.
home.heroMotto: Shingon calm, comedy timing, red on repeat.
home.about.title: About
home.about.body: I design and ship software with clarity, speed, and longevity in mind. My work spans mobile, web, and product design.
home.journey.title: Journey
home.journey.0.desc: Shipped iOS feature updates and fixes for a large consumer app.
home.journey.1.desc: Led requirements through system testing for financial systems, plus web feature work.
home.journey.2.desc: Flutter-first delivery, spanning AWS and web implementations; 2025–2026 focus.
home.journey.3.role: Yokohama National University, Faculty of Business Administration
